page.description: The .FULL_JUSTIFY() method full justifies text in an RTF memo object.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example full justifies text in an RTF field in an open form.
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.full_justify()
